* BrightBlade looked around her surroundings as she walked a bit behind of 
Perndabot, noting possible escape routes if she was chased by any Maximals 
once her mission was completed.
She looked down at the compartment in her leg, satisfied that Gangon was now 
safe. She smiled and she tapped her leg softly to get his attention.*

� Comfortable in there?�

* She then looked back at Perndabot just in time to see his eyes slide 
downward as he looked at her, her smile now a little bigger but then she 
simply shakes her head.
BrightBlade chuckled as she heard what he nearly said, knowing what word 
would have come out of his mouth if he hadn�t caught himself in time. She 
was actually flattered by what he was going to say.
She smiles at Perndabot as meets his eyes when they finally come back up to 
her face, almost to the point of letting him know that he had been caught. 
But she didn�t mind, if he liked what he saw then he liked what he saw. She 
wasn�t about to give him Hell for looking at her like that, she was rather 
taking it as a compliment that her body was worth looking at like that.
BrightBlade then looks ahead, seeing a fairly large tree in which Perndabot 
was heading straight for!*

� Watch��

* Perndabot had crashed right into the tree just before she could finish her 
sentence, a stump was all that was left.*

��out.�

* BrightBlade shook her head and chuckled, remembering just how many trees 
Gangon had crashed into while he was complimenting her. Men. Did they always 
act that way around her?
She smiled as she then continued walking, passing Perndabot and continuing 
towards the Cybertronien Fire.*

� Actually, it IS fairly advanced. One always has to have such tools when 
they�re in MY line of work.�

* BrightBlade then stretched again and walked in the comfortable way, with 
her hands behind her head. She rested her head against her own hands while 
they kept her head straight and looking forward, stretching her aching ribs 
in the process.
It was going to be a long day.*
